practice.title: Agreement Practice
practice.description: Interactive practice exercises for agreement

prompts.explanation: Adjective agrees with feminine singular noun
Adjective agrees with masculine plural noun
Adjective agrees with feminine plural noun

exercises.instructions: Place adjectives in the correct position

prompts.explanation: Descriptive adjectives usually follow the noun
Bueno shortens to buen before masculine singular nouns

exercises.instructions: Complete with the correct adjective form

prompts.explanation: Masculine singular form
Feminine plural form

questions.question: Which adjective agrees correctly with "las casas"?
questions.explanation: Adjective must agree in gender (feminine) and number (plural)

questions.question: Complete: El coche _____ (rojo)
questions.explanation: Masculine singular form matches el coche

practice.title: Agreement Position Practice
practice.description: Interactive practice exercises for agreement position

exercises.instructions: Identify the gender of these nouns

prompts.explanation: Most nouns ending in -a are feminine
Problema is masculine despite ending in -a

exercises.instructions: Form the plural of these nouns

prompts.explanation: Add -s to nouns ending in vowels
Add -es to nouns ending in consonants

questions.question: What is the gender of "problema"?
questions.explanation: Problema is masculine despite ending in -a
